title: HELP ME!! RIOT PLZ
body: so today i have a problem with my account, i was in que and got a notification that my account was logged on another location. i changed my password hoping to not get hacked again but left me getting locked out. i swear im not dumb, i even typed it twice and when i did it i quickly put the password in a text document. i need help with my password. this is my email used to change the password( sunnydiekill@yahoo.com ).

replies.body: Don't give your email to us.

Eeeeee sounds like someone might have been able to hack their way into your account! Reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as soon as you can to make sure your account is kept safe and repaired if needed!
